author: donaldp
msg: Threads are got from a pool and thus will never end. Thus when we were waiting for thread.join() it would wait indefinetly. Thus we now use monitors + wait()/notifyAll() to communicate between threads.

author: hammant
msg: ClassLoaderObjectInputStream moves from cornerstone to excalibur

author: donaldp
msg: Added TextMessageBuilder and supporting classes so that each individual property can be properly set in a manner similar to TextFormatters or JDBC targets etc.

author: donaldp
msg: Added MessageBuilder that used Formatter to generate text.
